    1: from collections.abc import Sequence
    2: from typing import Any, SupportsIndex, TypeAlias
    3: 
    4: _Shape: TypeAlias = tuple[int, ...]
    5: _AnyShape: TypeAlias = tuple[Any, ...]
    6: 
    7: # Anything that can be coerced to a shape tuple
    8: _ShapeLike: TypeAlias = SupportsIndex | Sequence[SupportsIndex]
